lines.text: Did you hear those screams last night?
I was sleeping off a pill Murdoch gave me for my nerves, I didn't hear a thing. What screams?
Oh, just screams. We've heard 'em before. Every time we do, we find out the next day that somebody died
Oh, now look, Tracy, you're not going soft and spooky on me, are you? I like you much better when you're your hard-bitten old self
Just the same, I'll bet you a box of girls' scout cookies that somebody died last night
